items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
8% increased Attack Speed
+69 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants cold resistance to you and your allies.

You and nearby allies gain 3% additional maximum Cold Resistance

items.name: Rearguard

14% Chance to Block Spell Damage

- Kiravi, Vaal Archer

items.name: Mark of Submission
explicitMods: Curse Enemies with Socketed Hex Curse Gem on Hit
flavourText: So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark,
that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.
explicitMods: Base duration is 11.80 seconds
20% increased Curse Duration
+1 metre to radius
Cursed enemies have 19% reduced Accuracy Rating
Cursed Normal or Magic enemies deal 29% less Damage
Cursed Rare or Unique enemies deal 18% less Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Rainbowstride
explicitMods: 18% Chance to Block Spell Damage
+57 to maximum Mana
+20% to all Elemental Resistances
20% increased Movement Speed
flavourText: "They say that you should take life's troubles in your stride.
Some men have a longer stride than others."
- Gaius Sentari

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon a Chilling Skitterbot and a Shocking Skitterbot, which will trigger your traps and detonate your mines. Mines detonated by Skitterbots will re-arm and can then be detonated again. The Skitterbots grant you more trap and mine damage, and cannot be targeted or damaged.

Minions have 19% increased Chill Effect
Minions have 19% increased Shock Effect
Maximum 1 Summoned Skitterbot of each type
Chilling Skitterbot's Aura Chills Enemies near it
Shocking Skitterbot's Aura Shocks Enemies near it
Skitterbots grant 10% more Trap and Mine Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

Base secondary duration is 0.20 seconds
30% more Melee Physical Damage

items.name: Queen of the Forest
explicitMods: 235% increased Evasion Rating
+61 to maximum Life
+6% to Fire Resistance
+34% to Cold Resistance
+13% to Lightning Resistance
25% reduced Movement Speed
1% increased Movement Speed per 600 Evasion Rating, up to 75%
-45 Physical Damage taken from Hits by Animals
flavourText: Shedding away her regal past,
she forged a new destiny.
Sacrificing the ephemeral joys of man,
she embraced the eternal grasp of nature.
Seizing her one true wish,
she found peace at last.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. It also regularly releases pulses of area damage. The Void Sphere will consume the corpses of any enemies which die in its area. Can only have one Void Sphere at a time.
explicitMods: Deals 27 to 40 Physical Damage
Base duration is 5.00 seconds
40% reduced Skill Effect Duration
Pulses every 0.40 seconds
40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
40% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
Enemies in range are Hindered, with up to 30% reduced Movement Speed, based on distance from the Void Sphere

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which makes nearby allies inflict impale with attacks, and lessens the accuracy of nearby enemies. Gain stages by impaling enemies while carrying the banner. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
